00020 // the key position in the BTreeNode
00021 enum EChildPos
00022 {
00023         ECP_INTHIS,
00024         ECP_INLEFT,
00025         ECP_INRIGHT,
00026         ECP_NONE,
00027 
00028         ECP_NEARLEFT, //wps add it.
00029         ECP_NEARRIGHT
00030 };
00031 
00032 typedef std::pair<size_t, EChildPos> OBJECTPOS;

00034 template <typename DataType, typename LockType,
00035                 typename Alloc =std::allocator<DataType> > class PtrObj :
00036         public RefCount<LockType> {
00037 public:
00038         PtrObj() {
00039                 pdat = NULL;
00040         }
00041         PtrObj(const DataType &other) {
00042                 pdat = new DataType(other);
00043         }
00044 
00045         void display(std::ostream& os = std::cout) {
00046                 //pdat->display();
00047                 //cout<<pdat->key;
00048         }
00049 
00050         virtual ~PtrObj() {
00051                 delete pdat;
00052         }
00053 
00054         /*       
00055          *   Assignment operator. Make a copy of the other object.
00056          */
00057         PtrObj& operator=(PtrObj& other) {
00058                 pdat = new DataType(*other.pdat);
00059                 return *this;
00060         }
00061 
00062         /*bool operator <=(PtrObj& other) {
00063          return *pdat.compare(*other.pdat);
00064 
00065          }*/
00066 
00067 public:
00068         DataType* pdat;
00069 };

00108 template<typename KeyType, typename DataType, typename LockType, typename Alloc> class BTreeNode :
00109         public RefCount<LockType> {

00237         void display(std::ostream& os = std::cout) {
00238 
00239                 size_t i;
00240                 for (i=0; i<objCount; i++) {
00241                         if (!isLeaf) {
00242                                 if (children[i])
00243                                         children[i]->display(os);
00244                                 os<<"----|";
00245                         }
00246                         if (elements[i]) {
00247                                 elements[i]->display(os);
00248                                 if (parent) {
00249                                         //cout<<"( "<<childNo<<" "<<parent->objCount<<") ";
00250                                         assert(childNo <= parent->objCount);
00251                                 }
00252                         }
00253                         cout<<endl;
00254                 }
00255                 if (!isLeaf) {
00256                         if (children[i])
00257                                 children[i]->display();
00258                         os<<"----|";
00259                 }
00260         }

00296 // Constructor initialises everything to its default value.
00297 // Not that we assume that the node is a leaf,
00298 // and it is not loaded from the disk.
00299 template<typename KeyType, typename DataType, typename LockType, typename Alloc> BTreeNode<
00300                 KeyType, DataType, LockType, Alloc>::BTreeNode() :
00301         childNo((size_t)-1), objCount(0), isLeaf(true), loaded(false), fpos(-1) {
00302         _isDirty = 1;
00303         //_overFlowAddress = 0;
00304 
00305         level = 0;
00306         activeNodeNum++;
00307         //cout<<"activeNodeNum: "<<activeNodeNum<<endl;
00308 
00309 }

00311 // Read a node page to initialize this node from the disk
00312 template<typename KeyType, typename DataType, typename LockType, typename Alloc> bool BTreeNode<
00313                 KeyType, DataType, LockType, Alloc>::read(FILE* f) {
00314 
00315         long _overFlowAddress;
00316 
00317 //#ifdef DEBUG
00318 //      static int _rcount;
00319 //      cout<<"reading "<<_rcount++<<endl;
00320 //#endif
00321 
00322         if (!f) {
00323                 return false;
00324         }
00325 
00326         //cout<<"read from fpos "<<fpos<<endl;
00327         // get to the right location
00328         if (0 != fseek(f, fpos, SEEK_SET)) {
00329                 return false;
00330         }
00331         // read the leaf flag and the object count
00332         byte leafFlag = 0;
00333         if (1 != fread(&leafFlag, sizeof(byte), 1, f)) {
00334                 return false;
00335         }
00336         if (1 != fread(&objCount, sizeof(size_t), 1, f)) {
00337                 return false;
00338         }
00339         isLeaf = (leafFlag == 1);
00340 
00341         // read the addresses of the child pages
00342         if (objCount> 0 && !isLeaf) {
00343                 long* childAddresses = new long[objCount + 1];
00344                 long* thisChild = childAddresses;
00345                 memset(childAddresses, 0xff, sizeof(long) * (objCount + 1));
00346                 if (objCount + 1
00347                                 != fread(childAddresses, sizeof(long), objCount + 1, f)) {
00348                         delete[] childAddresses;
00349                         return false;
00350                 }
00351                 children.resize(objCount + 1);
00352 
00353                 //Only allocate childnode when the node is no a leaf node.
00354                 if ( !isLeaf) {
00355                         for (size_t ctr = 0; ctr <= objCount; ctr++) {
00356                                 if (children[ctr] == 0) {
00357                                         children[ctr].reset(new BTreeNode);
00358                                 }
00359                                 children[ctr]->fpos = *thisChild++;
00360                                 children[ctr]->childNo = ctr;
00361                                 //cout<<children[ctr]->fpos<<endl;
00362                         }
00363                         delete[] childAddresses;
00364                 }
00365         }
00366 
00367         // read the contents
00368         objects.resize(objCount);
00369         elements.resize(objCount);
00370 
00371         long nextReadPos = ftell(f);
00372 
00373         bool fposChanged = false;
00374 
00375         for (size_t ctr = 0; ctr < objCount; ctr++) {
00376                 if (fposChanged) {
00377                         if (0 != fseek(f, nextReadPos, SEEK_SET)) {
00378                                 return false;
00379                         }
00380                 }
00381                 //cout<<" read from data"<< nextReadPos<<endl;
00382                 size_t recSize;
00383 
00384                 // read the size of the DbObj.
00385                 if (1 != fread(&recSize, sizeof(size_t), 1, f)) {
00386                         return false;
00387                 }
00388                 //cout<<recSize<< " vs "<< _maxDataSize<<endl;
00389 
00390                 byte* pBuf = new byte[recSize];
00391                 if (recSize <= _maxDataSize) {
00392                         //read the data of the DbObj to pBuf.
00393                         if (1 != fread(pBuf, recSize, 1, f)) {
00394                                 return false;
00395                         }
00396                         nextReadPos = ftell(f);
00397                         fposChanged = false;
00398                 } else {
00399                         if (1 != fread(pBuf, _maxDataSize, 1, f)) {
00400                                 return false;
00401                         }
00402 
00403                         if (1 != fread(&_overFlowAddress, sizeof(long), 1, f) ) {
00404                                 return false;
00405                         }
00406                         nextReadPos = ftell(f);
00407 
00408                         //cout<<" read from overflow"<< _overFlowAddress<<endl;
00409                         //cout<<" read left size "<<recSize - _maxDataSize<<endl;
00410 
00411                         // get to the overflow location
00412                         fposChanged = true;
00413                         if (0 != fseek(f, _overFlowAddress, SEEK_SET)) {
00414                                 return false;
00415                         }
00416                         if (1 != fread(pBuf + _maxDataSize, recSize - _maxDataSize, 1, f)) {
00417                                 return false;
00418                         }
00419                         //int nopage = (recSize -_maxDataSize) / _overFlowSize;
00420                         //if (recSize - _maxDataSize > nopage * _overFlowSize) {
00421                         //nopage++;
00422                         //}
00423                         //_preOverflowMap[ctr] = make_pair(_overFlowAddress, nopage);
00424 
00425                 }
00426                 assert(recSize != 0);
00427                 //for dbg               
00428                 objects[ctr]. reset(new DbObj(pBuf, recSize));
00429 
00430                 //sync
00431                 DataType dat;
00432                 read_image(dat, objects[ctr]);
00433                 elements[ctr].reset(new PtrObj<DataType, LockType, Alloc>(dat));
00434 
00435                 //cout<<"reading ";
00436                 //cout<<dat.size()<<" "<<dat<<endl;
00437 
00438                 delete[] pBuf;
00439         }
00440 
00441         loaded = true;
00442         _isDirty = false;
00443         return true;
00444 }
00445 
00446 template<typename KeyType, typename DataType, typename LockType, typename Alloc> bool BTreeNode<
00447                 KeyType, DataType, LockType, Alloc>::write(FILE* f) {
00448 
00449         typedef pair<long, size_t> OverflowInfo;
00450         map<size_t, OverflowInfo> _overflowMap;
00451 
00452         long _overFlowAddress = 0;
00453 
00454         // If we're not loaded, we haven't been changed it ,
00455         // so we can say that the flush was successful.
00456         if (!_isDirty) {
00457                 return true;
00458         }
00459 
00460         if (!loaded) {
00461                 return true;
00462         }
00463 
00464         if (!f) {
00465                 return false;
00466         }
00467 
00468 //#ifdef DEBUG
00469         //static int _wcount;
00470         //cout<<"write "<<_wcount++ <<endl;
00471 //#endif
00472 
00473         if (0 != fseek(f, 0, SEEK_END)) {
00474                 return false;
00475         }
00476         _overFlowAddress = ftell(f);
00477 
00478         // get to the right location
00479         if (0 != fseek(f, fpos, SEEK_SET)) {
00480                 return false;
00481         }
00482         //cout<<"write data "<<fpos<<endl;
00483 
00484         // write the leaf flag and the object count
00485         byte leafFlag = isLeaf ? 1 : 0;
00486         if (1 != fwrite(&leafFlag, sizeof(byte), 1, f)) {
00487                 return false;
00488         }
00489         if (1 != fwrite(&objCount, sizeof(size_t), 1, f)) {
00490                 return false;
00491         }
00492 
00493         //cout<<"write count= "<<objCount<<endl;
00494 
00495         // write the addresses of the child pages
00496         if (objCount> 0 && !isLeaf) {
00497                 long* childAddresses = new long[objCount + 1];
00498                 long* thisChild = childAddresses;
00499                 memset(childAddresses, 0xff, sizeof(long) * (objCount + 1));
00500 
00501                 BIT tnvit = children.begin();
00502                 while (tnvit != children.end()) {
00503                         if ((BTreeNodePtr)(*tnvit) != 0) {
00504                                 *thisChild = (*tnvit)->fpos;
00505                         }
00506                         ++thisChild;
00507                         ++tnvit;
00508                 }
00509                 size_t longsWritten = fwrite(childAddresses, sizeof(long),
00510                                 objCount + 1, f);
00511                 delete[] childAddresses;
00512                 if (objCount + 1 != longsWritten) {
00513                         return false;
00514                 }
00515         }
00516         //sync
00517         objects.resize(elements.size() );
00518         for (size_t ctr=0; ctr<objCount; ctr++) {
00519                 objects[ctr].reset(new DbObj);
00520                 write_image(*elements[ctr]->pdat, objects[ctr]);
00521                 //cout<<"writing "<< *elements[ctr]->pdat <<endl;
00522         }
00523 
00524         // write the contents
00525         DBOBJVECTOR::iterator dovit = objects.begin();
00526         for (size_t ctr=0; ctr<objCount; ctr++) {
00527 
00528                 DbObjPtr pObj = objects[ctr];
00529                 size_t sz = pObj->getSize();
00530                 //write the size of the data of DbObj.  
00531 
00532                 if ( 1 != fwrite(&sz, sizeof(size_t), 1, f)) {
00533                         return false;
00534                 }
00535 
00536                 //write the data of DbObj.      
00537                 byte *pd;
00538                 pd = (byte* )pObj->getData();
00539                 if (sz <= _maxDataSize) {
00540                         if ( 1 != fwrite(pd, sz, 1, f) ) {
00541                                 return false;
00542                         }
00543                 } else {
00544                         int nopage = (sz -_maxDataSize) / _overFlowSize;
00545                         if (sz - _maxDataSize > nopage * _overFlowSize) {
00546                                 nopage++;
00547                         }
00548                         if (1 != fwrite(pd, _maxDataSize, 1, f)) {
00549                                 return false;
00550                         }
00551                         if (1 != fwrite(&_overFlowAddress, sizeof(long), 1, f)) {
00552                                 return false;
00553                         }
00554                         _overflowMap[ctr] = make_pair(_overFlowAddress, nopage);
00555 
00556                         //overFlowAddress is always at the end of file.
00557                         _overFlowAddress += _overFlowSize * nopage;
00558                 }
00559         }
00560 
00561         //write overflowpage
00562         for (map<size_t, OverflowInfo>::iterator it = _overflowMap.begin(); it
00563                         != _overflowMap.end(); it++) {
00564 
00565                 byte *pd;
00566                 size_t sz;
00567                 pd = (byte* )objects[it->first]->getData();
00568                 sz = objects[it->first]->getSize();
00569 
00570                 //cout<<"size "<<sz<<endl;      
00571                 //cout<<"overflow size "<< sz- _maxDataSize<<endl;
00572 
00573                 byte *pbuf;
00574                 pbuf = new byte[it->second.second * _overFlowSize];
00575                 memcpy(pbuf, pd + _maxDataSize, sz- _maxDataSize);
00576 
00577                 long overFlowAddress = it->second.first;
00578 
00579                 /*if ( (_preOverflowMap.find(it->first) != _preOverflowMap.end())
00580                  && _preOverflowMap[it->first].second >= it->second.second) {
00581                  cout<<"not change overFlwoAddress";
00582                  overFlowAddress = _preOverflowMap[it->first].first;
00583                  }*/
00584 
00585                 if (0 != fseek(f, overFlowAddress, SEEK_SET)) {
00586                         return false;
00587                 }
00588                 if (1 != fwrite(pbuf, it->second.second*_overFlowSize, 1, f)) {
00589                         return false;
00590                 }
00591                 delete [] pbuf;
00592         }
00593         _isDirty = false;
00594         //fflush(f);
00595         return true;
00596 }
00597 
00598 // Load a child node from the disk. This requires that we
00599 // have the filepos already in place.
00600 template<typename KeyType, typename DataType, typename LockType, typename Alloc> intrusive_ptr<BTreeNode<KeyType, DataType,LockType, Alloc> > BTreeNode<
00601                 KeyType, DataType, LockType, Alloc>::loadChild(size_t childNum, FILE* f) {
00602 
00603         BTreeNodePtr child;
00604         child = children[childNum];
00605         if ((BTreeNodePtr)child == 0) {
00606                 child.reset(new BTreeNode);
00607                 children[childNo] = child;
00608         }
00609         child->childNo = childNum;
00610         _lock.acquire_write_lock();
00611         if ( !child->loaded) {
00612                 child->read(f);
00613                 child->parent.reset(this);
00614         }
00615         _lock.release_write_lock();     
00616         child->level = this->level+1;
00617         return child;
00618 }
00619 
00620 // Unload a child, which means that we get rid of all
00621 // children in the children vector.
00622 template<typename KeyType, typename DataType, typename LockType, typename Alloc> void BTreeNode<
00623                 KeyType, DataType, LockType, Alloc>::unload() {
00624         if (loaded) {
00625                 // Clear out all of the children
00626                 BIT tnvit = children.begin();
00627                 while (!isLeaf && tnvit != children.end()) {
00628                         (*tnvit)->unload();
00629                         //BIT temp = tnvit;
00630                         tnvit->reset(0);
00631                         ++tnvit;
00632                 }
00633 
00634                 DBOBJVECTOR::iterator dovit = objects.begin();
00635                 DIT dovit1 = elements.begin();
00636 
00637                 while (dovit != objects.end()) {
00638                         dovit->reset(0);
00639                         ++dovit;
00640                 }
00641 
00642                 while (dovit1 != elements.end()) {
00643                         dovit1->reset(0);
00644                         ++dovit1;
00645                 }
00646 
00647                 children.resize(0);
00648                 objects.resize(0);
00649                 elements.resize(0);
00650 
00651                 // Empty the parent node and indicate that the
00652                 // node is no longer loaded.
00653                 parent.reset(0);
00654                 loaded = false;
00655         }
00656 }

00658 
00659 template<typename KeyType, typename DataType, typename LockType, typename Alloc> bool BTreeNode<
00660                 KeyType, DataType, LockType, Alloc>::delFromLeaf(size_t objNo) {
00661         bool ret = isLeaf;
00662         if (ret) {
00663                 //objects[objNo].reset();               
00664                 elements[objNo].reset(0);
00665                 for (size_t ctr = objNo + 1; ctr < objCount; ctr++) {
00666                         //objects[ctr - 1] = objects[ctr];
00667                         elements[ctr-1] = elements[ctr];
00668                 }
00669                 setCount(objCount - 1);
00670         }
00671         _isDirty = 1;
00672         return ret;
00673 }
00674 
00675 // Find the position of the object in a node. If the key is at pos
00676 // the function returns (pos, ECP_INTHIS). If the key is in a child to
00677 // the left of pos, the function returns (pos, ECP_INLEFT). If the node
00678 // is an internal node, the function returns (objCount, ECP_INRIGHT).
00679 // Otherwise, the function returns ((size_t)-1, false).
00680 // The main assumption here is that we won't be searching for a key
00681 // in this node unless it (a) is not in the tree, or (b) it is in the
00682 // subtree rooted at this node.
00683 
00684 
00685 template<typename KeyType, typename DataType, typename LockType, typename Alloc> OBJECTPOS BTreeNode<
00686                 KeyType, DataType, LockType, Alloc>::findPos(const KeyType& key) {
00687 
00688         OBJECTPOS ret((size_t)-1, ECP_NONE);
00689         DIT dovit = elements.begin();
00690         size_t ctr = 0;
00691         while (dovit < elements.end()) {
00692                 //int compVal = CompareFun(key, (*dovit)->dat.get_key() );
00693                 int compVal = comp(key, (*dovit)->pdat->get_key() );
00694                 if (compVal == 0) {
00695                         return OBJECTPOS(ctr, ECP_INTHIS);
00696                 } else if (compVal < 0) {
00697                         if (isLeaf) {
00698                                 return ret;
00699                         } else {
00700                                 return OBJECTPOS(ctr, ECP_INLEFT);
00701                         }
00702                 }
00703                 ++dovit, ++ctr;
00704         }
00705         if (!isLeaf) {
00706                 return OBJECTPOS(ctr - 1, ECP_INRIGHT);
00707         }
00708         return ret;
00709 
00710 }
00711 
00712 template<typename KeyType, typename DataType, typename LockType, typename Alloc> OBJECTPOS BTreeNode<
00713                 KeyType, DataType, LockType, Alloc>::findPos1(const KeyType& key) {
00714 
00715         OBJECTPOS ret((size_t)-1, ECP_NONE);
00716         DIT dovit = elements.begin();
00717         size_t ctr = 0;
00718         while (dovit < elements.end()) {
00719                 //int compVal = CompareFun(key, (*dovit)->dat.get_key() );
00720                 int compVal = comp(key, (*dovit)->pdat->get_key() );
00721                 if (compVal == 0) {
00722                         return OBJECTPOS(ctr, ECP_INTHIS);
00723                 } else if (compVal < 0) {
00724                         if (isLeaf) {
00725                                 return OBJECTPOS(ctr, ECP_NEARLEFT);;
00726                         } else {
00727                                 return OBJECTPOS(ctr, ECP_INLEFT);
00728                         }
00729                 }
00730                 ++dovit, ++ctr;
00731         }
00732         if (!isLeaf) {
00733                 return OBJECTPOS(ctr - 1, ECP_INRIGHT);
00734         } else if (ctr>0) {
00735                 return OBJECTPOS(ctr - 1, ECP_NEARRIGHT);
00736         }
00737         return ret;
00738 
00739 }
